title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
description: Coming soon to Microsoft OneDrive: OneDrive iOS users will be able to use Apple original pencil toolkit to create, edit, and manage PDF annotations. This integration will provide users with advanced, low-latency tools that align with Apple Pencil experience, making it easier and more enjoyable for iOS users to annotate PDFs within OneDrive.
